mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_mail, user_phone, user_wal_id, user_privilege, mvo_type, mvo_url, mvo_eng_name, mvo_introduction) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userWalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPrivilege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mvoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mvoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mvoEngName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mvoIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_mail = #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_wal_id = #{userWalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_privilege = #{userPrivilege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mvo_type = #{mvoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mvo_url = #{mvoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mvo_eng_name = #{mvoEngName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mvo_introduction = #{mvoIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_password, user_name, user_mail, user_phone, user_wal_id, user_privilege, mvo_type, mvo_url, mvo_eng_name, mvo_introduction from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, user_password, user_name, user_mail, user_phone, user_wal_id, user_privilege, mvo_type, mvo_url, mvo_eng_name, mvo_introduction from user
